titles: A Choice collection of new songs and ballads the words made to several pleasant tunes / by Mr. D'urfey ; with tunes transpos'd for the flute.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
Playford, Henry, b. 1657.
publisher: Printed by William Pearson ... for Henry Playford and sold by him at his shop ...,
notes: The composers of the songs are not named.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
